subject: Golf
Anxiety and Stress
lead_paragraph: Several players at Van Cortlandt Park golf course in the Bronx said they had experienced anxiety attacks, similar to what PGA Tour player Charlie Beljan went through on Friday, while playing a round.
snippet: Several players at Van Cortlandt Park golf course in the Bronx said they had experienced anxiety attacks, similar to what PGA Tour player Charlie Beljan went through on Friday, while playing a round.
